variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: The main character or object to be illustrated. This could be a creature, an animal, or even an abstract form.
variable_explanations.[COLOR]: The accent color to be used alongside the dominant black and white. Think of colors like 'ochre', 'vibrant red', 'deep teal', or 'electric blue'.
variable_explanations.[MOOD]: The emotional atmosphere of the image. Examples include 'playful suspense', 'curious', 'ominous yet intriguing', or 'absurd'.
variable_explanations.[SCENE]: A brief description of the context or setting, even if minimal. Examples: 'in a vast void', 'on a desolate plain', 'emerging from darkness'.
